quote: I like the night. Without the dark, we'd never see the stars.
author: Stephenie Meyer

quote: Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: I have loved the stars too fondly to be fearful of the night.
author: Sarah   Williams

quote: The darker the night, the brighter the stars,
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: Each night, when I go to sleep, I die. And the next morning, when I wake up, I am reborn.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: What hath night to do with sleep?
author: John Milton

quote: The night is the hardest time to be alive and 4am knows all my secrets.
author: Poppy Z. Brite

quote: This is night, Diddykins. That's what we call it when it goes all dark like this.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: The longest way must have its close - the gloomiest night will wear on to a morning.
author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quote: Melancholy were the sounds on a winter's night.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: I love the silent hour of night,
author: Anne Brontë

quote: She wanted none of those days to end, and it was always with disappointment that she watched the darkness stride forward.
author: Markus Zusak

quote: Some nights are made for torture, or reflection, or the savoring of loneliness.
author: Poppy Z.Brite

quote: It was the possibility of darkness that made the day seem so bright.
author: Stephen King

quote: The sky grew darker, painted blue on blue, one stroke at a time, into deeper and deeper shades of night.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: There were once two sisters
author: Jandy Nelson

quote: Night Triumphant- and the Stars Eternal.
author: Sarah J. Maas

quote: So I am not a broken heart.
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: I don't need to kill goats to say things. I CAN talk.
author: L.J. Smith

quote: sleep is such a luxury, which i cant afford.
author: Robin Sikarwar

quote: We sat in the car
author: Brian Andreas

quote: And the night shall be filled with music,
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: I wanted what most people wanted—love, companionship.
author: Chloe Neill

quote: May I kiss you then? On this miserable paper? I might as well open the window and kiss the night air.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Softly, deftly, music shall caress you. Hear it, feel it, Secretly possess you.
author: Charles  Hart

quote: Talon glanced wistfully at his drink as he debated what should take priority. 'Coffee… Daimons… Coffee… Daimons…
author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quote: The stars are brilliant at this time of night
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: i want to be
author: Sanober Khan

quote: No one but Night, with tears on her dark face, watches beside me in this windy place.
author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quote: Whoever thinks of going to bed before twelve o'clock is a scoundrel.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: When I did finally speak, I surprised myself by saying exactly what was on my mind. “You must hate me.
author: Kristin Cast

quote: Night is a time of rigor, but also of mercy. There are truths which one can see only when it’s dark
author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quote: All shadows of clouds the sun cannot hide
author: Munia Khan

quote: We love the night and its quiet; and there is no night that we love so well as that on which the moon is coffined in clouds.
author: Fitz-James O'Brien

quote: In the dark I rest,
author: Denise Levertov

quote: all those nights with the phone warming the side of my face like the sun.
author: Warsan Shire

quote: I love to watch the fine mist of the night come on,
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: The unwelcome November rain had perversely stolen the day's last hour and pawned it with that ancient fence, the night.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: There is no such thing as a good call at 7 AM. It's been my experience that all calls between the hours of 11 PM and 9 AM are disaster calls.
author: Janet Evanovich

quote: Good night - may you fall asleep in the arms of a dream, so beautiful, you'll cry when you awake.
author: Michael Faudet

quote: I'm hungry for a juicy life. I lean out my window at night and I can taste it out there, just waiting for me.
author: Brigid Lowry

quote: I had a dream about you last night. I was alone on a dark night and you came to me as a firefly. I knew it was you because you were the brightest.
author: Crystal Hudson

quote: The moon will guide you through the night with her brightness, but she will always dwell in the darkness, in order to be seen.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Will," she said softly, sleepily. "Last night--" You were kind to me, she was going to say. Thank you.
author: Cassandra Clare

quote: It was a wonderful night, such a night as is only possible when we are young, dear reader.
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: This is the ending. Now not day only shall be beloved, but night too shall be beautiful and blessed and all its fear pass away.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: What-what do you want?" Annabeth asked, trying to maintain a tone of confidence.
author: Rick Riordan

quote: The clouds were disappearing rapidly, leaving the stars to die. The night dried up.
author: Andre Breton

quote: The sky is already purple; the first few stars have appeared, suddenly, as if someone had thrown a handful of silver across the edge of the world.
author: Alice Hoffman

quote: That was the only decision there was once upon a time: what to do with the night.
author: Harry Crews

quote: that's because it's from the night, and the night keeps secrets
author: Maggie Stiefvater

quote: Anything seems possible at night when the rest of the world has gone to sleep.
author: David Almond

quote: He's waiting for yu, young queen.'
author: P.C. Cast

quote: There is a loveliness to life that does not fade. Even in the terrors of the night, there is a tendency toward grace that does not fail us.
author: Robert Goolrick

quote: Down there the nights are bright and nobody believes in the Devil.
author: Cornelia Funke

quote: The stars are forth, the moon above the tops
author: George Gordon Byron

quote: Night, which in Autumn seems to fall from the sky so suddenly, chilled us...
author: Jules Barbey d'Aurevilly

quote: That night was a dark day. Of course, all nights are dark days, because night is simply a badly lit version of day, ...
author: Lemony Snicket

quote: Deep down inside, my heart knew the score.
author: Alyson Noel

quote: Aren’t all fairy tales based in fact? You yourself are supposed to be nothing more than a myth.
author: Gena Showalter

quote: At night the fog was thick and full of light, and sometimes voices.
author: Erin Bow

quote: For Death is the meaning of night;
author: Cox, Michael

quote: It’s the beating of my heart.
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: I can't give you the sunset, but I can give you the night.
author: Erin McCarthy

quote: When the world is itself draped in the mantle of night, the mirror of the mind is like the sky in which thoughts twinkle like stars.
author: Khushwant Singh

quote: Allah causes the night and the day to succeed each other. Truly, in these things is indeed a lesson for those who have insight.
author: Anonymous

quote: Night is certainly more novel and less profane than day.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: It looked as if a night of dark intent was coming, and not only a night, an age. Someone had better be prepared for rage...
author: Robert Frost

quote: Q: Why do I love thee, O Night?
author: Vera Nazarian

quote: May night continue to fall upon the orchestra
author: Andre Breton

quote: The night sky is only a sort of carbon paper,
author: Sylvia Plath

quote: When the Deep Purple falls,
author: Rebecca Wells

quote: The craving to risk death is our last great perversion. We come from night, we go into night. Why live in night?
author: John Fowles

quote: By night the skyscraper looms in the smoke and the stars and has a soul.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: Like it or not, there are people who are capable to love
author: Toba Beta [Betelgeuse Incident]

quote: Saturday night is perfect for writers because other people have "plans.
author: Mike Birbiglia

quote: If people don't wish to be eaten then they shouldn't taste so nice
author: Amy Mah-Vampire

quote: Press close, bare-bosomed Night!
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Now she’s lit by the warm orange spreading from the horizon as not-quite-day, becomes not-quite-night
author: David Levithan

quote: Soundlessly whispering into the void, my lips moving quickly, silently, without ceasing. Calling his name, calling him to me.
author: Alyson Noel

quote: Foolishness sleeps soundly, while knowledge turns with each thinking hour, longing for the dawn of answers.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: Who says you cannot hold the moon in your hand?
author: Vera Nazarian

quote: Every star was once darker than the night, before it awoke.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: The summer demands and takes away too much. /But night, the reserved, the reticent, gives more than it takes
author: John Ashbery

quote: I got tired of feeling like Dracula. I wanted to see some daylight, and not just at six o’clock in the morning.
author: Kate Moss

quote: The dawn of beauty always comes after night.
author: Sorin Cerin

quote: a silent night. - the most eloquent poem i have ever read.
author: Sanober Khan

quote: A cool breeze stirred my hair at that moment, as the night wind began to come down from the hills, but it felt like a breath from another world.
author: Francis Marion Crawford

quote: Ceaseless as the interminable voices of the bell-cricket, all night till dawn my tears flow.
author: Murasaki Shikibu

quote: Bright colours in the west, giant butterflies dancing as night crept like a cripple toward the east.
author: Roberto Bolaño

quote: If we had more sleepless nights in prayer, there would be fewer souls to have a sleepless eternal night in hell.
author: Leonard Ravenhill

quote: A word only writes
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: A lonely night is more profound then lonesome nights.
author: Santosh Kalwar

quote: The night is still waiting.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: Lie you easy, dream you light,
author: A.E. Housman

quote: Night is mine, together with a substantial part of the future.
author: Nelly Kaplan

quote: Last night, lost in spaces between star—bays and lakes of clouds, I tossed and turned looking for you
author: john j geddes

quote: Walk with this tomorrow night. If nothing happens, then
author: Keith Kekic

quote: By night, I am free.
author: Courtney Cole

quote: Then Deborah stood at the wicket gate, the boundary, and there was a woman with outstretched hand, demanding tickets.
author: Daphne du Maurier

quote: The only true borders lie between day and night, between life and death, between hope and loss.
author: Erin Hunter

quote: There had to be something wrong with my life. I should have been born a Yugoslavian shepherd who looked up at the Big Dipper every night.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: Down the hill I went, and then,
author: Sara Teasdale

quote: Isn't it queer that the things we writhe over at night are seldom wicked things? Just humiliating ones.
author: L.M. Montgomery

quote: O night, O sweetest time, though black of hue,
author: Michelangelo Buonarroti

quote: Tonight, It's not about You, Tonight It's about Me,
author: Syed Murtaza Haroon

quote: Again and again, the cicada’s untiring cry pierced the sultry summer air like a needle at work on thick cotton cloth.
author: Yukio Mishima

quote: Now the night's breath responds to the sea, which I can scarcely hear from here, as it reminisces about its shipwrecks.
author: Joe Bousquet

quote: At night the sky is pure astronomy.
author: Nicole Krauss

quote: I've just been bitten on the neck by a vampire... mosquito. Does that mean that when the night comes I will rise and be annoying?
author: Vera Nazarian

quote: The nights were long, like the braids of a pretty girl, and the days were short, like a girl's sense. ("The North")
author: Yevgeny Zamyatin

quote: Saffy could tell by the feel of the darkness that Caddy was awake. She said, "Caddy, how far back can you remember?"
author: Hilary McKay

quote: Slowly the truth is loading
author: David Gray

quote: And here face down beneath the sun
author: Archibald MacLeish

quote: Tonight’s going to be one of those things that seem to last forever.
author: Cath Crowley

quote: And at the end of the night, they realized how important those little stars were, which they ignored while adoring the beauty of the moon whole night.
author: Akshay Vasu

quote: A sense of wrongness, of fraught unease, as if long nails scraped the surface of the moon, raising the hackles of the soul.
author: China Miéville

quote: You knows dat in New Orleans is not morning 'til dee sun come up.
author: Tom Robbins

quote: He stopped and leaned against a pole and looked up at the deaf and swollen sky. It was a movement of dark shapes, a hurrying, a running.
author: Charles Beaumont

quote: The nearer the dawn
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Night was come, and her planets were risen: a safe, still night: too serene for the companionship of fear.
author: Charlotte Brontë

quote: You are the stories and incidents that you never tell to anyone. You are the thoughts that you get while standing under the
author: Akshay Vasu

quote: The air was full of all the night noises that, taken together, make one big silence...
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Bound, elbow to elbow, darkness and night entered the dwelling.
author: Luis Buñuel

quote: The night was white-blind with fog, and Kate staggered over every stone and stumbled in every puddle, but she pushed on as fast as she could.
author: Erin Bow

quote: Day or night, good or bad…all things from within.
author: T.F. Hodge

quote: The night has a thousand eyes
author: Francis William Bourdillon

quote: One thing about London is that when you step out into the night, it swallows you.
author: Sebastian Faulks

quote: Before the first before and after the last after, there is night waiting.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: The night stared me in the face, amorphous, blind, infinite, without frontiers. Not a single start relieved the darkness behind the glass.
author: Stanisław Lem

quote: Will the day tell its secret
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: Sleep is an under-ocean dipped into each night.
author: Jim Morrison

quote: They will smile, as they always do when they plan a major attack late in the night.
author: Dejan Stojanovic

quote: Magic of the nights is always much impressive than the magic of the days! ~
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: The window shades have all been removed. Nighttime is now free to encroach.
author: Tracy Letts

quote: You deicde, and you make our night what you want. Brilliant and ours. Stupid and theirs.
author: Arthur Phillips

quote: As he took them in his arms, the crying of the babies permeated the night like a trail of blood calling out to a predator.
author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón

quote: Thanks, Pepe. You've put an extra night into my life. I would have spent it just sleeping like an ox, but I've lived it instead. I'm grateful.
author: Manuel Vázquez Montalbán

quote: Twilight was laying claim to the cité, and the sky was a deepening shade of lavender, spangled with stars and fleecy clouds the colour of plums.
author: Sharon Kay Penman

quote: I ran from them. Nights, yellow lights
author: Deborah Ager

quote: Death’s life should have listened to the moonly whispers of breathing in the coldest nights
author: Munia Khan

quote: And all we feared inside the night / shows true in morning's biased light.
author: Garth VonBuchholz

quote: The sea was silent, the sky was silent; I was alone with the night and silence.
author: H.G. Wells

quote: The cadence of suffering has begun. Every evening at dusk, my heart constricts until night has come.
author: Cesare Pavese

quote: To hearts which near each other move
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: You sleep too early every night trying to dreamed your dreams while I sleep late every night trying to fulfill mine.
author: Jimvirle/Jinvirle

quote: Last night we kept on dreaming together!
author: Avijeet Das

quote: In a sleepless ordinary night like any other, Black is the warmest colour﻿...close your eyes to see better.
author: Efrat Cybulkiewicz

quote: The only ones awake at three in the morning are either those who are lonely or those who are in love
author: Faraaz Kazi

quote: There's no good reason why I shouldn't kiss you right now.
author: Giovannie de Sadeleer

quote: His fragile night was ready for her loving light.
author: Giovannie de Sadeleer

quote: Infinite sensations. Pearly night air.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Oh and night, the night, when a wind full of infinite space gnaws at our faces
author: Maggie Stiefvater

quote: I’d rather live in a world where I get to love the moon than in one where I don’t, even if the moon won’t return the feeling.
author: Alex London

quote: Believe in the night, it is magical. Nighttime awakens the core of the self where all of our demons that rest in daylight are up for us to tame.
author: Michael Lottner

quote: Last night we spun dreams from the cobwebs of time!
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Each day was an unfinished thought. Night was a secret bursting to be told.
author: Sherry Jones

quote: It's made of poetry and art and lost hearts enhanced in magic
author: Claudia Pavel

quote: She spared a glance for the townscape of jagged roofs and straggly tree branches, of rough edges that snagged the sky and made it bleed starlight.
author: Angela Panayotopulos

quote: I like the night, I have clearer ideas in the dark.
author: Serge Gainsbourg

quote: The things of the night cannot be explained in the day, because they do not then exist.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Even a man who is pure in heart,
author: Curt Siodmak

quote: But I look up above and see the sky
author: Talia Basma

quote: Night is
author: Denise Levertov

quote: Before I met you, all I could see was a black hole.
author: Giovannie de Sadeleer

quote: The night itself is riddled with her, wide with her, and alive with her.
author: Gabriela Mistral

quote: Night is the struggle within ourselves.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: The elegant figures of the constellations spun above them, driven by the wheel of the heavens.
author: Jennifer Zeynab Joukhadar

quote: It is the very error of the moon. She comes more nearer earth than she was wont. And makes men mad.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: If you deprive yourself of night’s mystery, you will devoid of universe’s mystery too!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: The sky was so thick with stars it was as if he could reach out and brush them with his hand.
author: justin cronin

quote: Both times it was loneliness, and the night, and panic afterwards.
author: E.M. Forster

quote: It ain’t much of a story, but I don’t feel like tellin it at the moment. Maybe a different night under different stars. These ones are too hopeful.
author: Alden Bell

quote: Welcome to the place on the other side of midnight.
author: Mladen Đorđević

quote: At night I have wings.
author: Franz Richter

quote: Upon the honey’d middle of the night,
author: John Keats

quote: She blazed. She kindled. Out of the night she burnt like a white star.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Where people are gone the night falls upward, black and unmanned.
author: Rachel Kushner

quote: Bear, I need your eyes. I need your nose. I need your night-wits and forest-wisdom.
author: Frances Hardinge

quote: Tis the night to think on, will the morrow come?
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: Stars aren't the only things that shine at night.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: We’re under the same starry sky,” I say.
author: Jenn Bennett

quote: Watching the sun set is like watching a beautiful kid die for a good cause.
author: Darnell Lamont Walker

quote: Eastern Standard Time
author: Billy Collins

quote: The days are for freedom and the nights for love.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: Look ahead to the bright light
author: Soulla Christodoulou

quote: Sam wanted to get up, calmly set his napkin down, and sprint out into the night.
author: Mary H.K. Choi

quote: Night has fallen. And it will last for a very long time.
author: Jake Halpern

quote: I hate the night, the awful night!
author: Noha Alaa El-Din

quote: A Night can NEVER defeat the Sunrise
author: Sumit Sharma

quote: The bluish, pale
author: Mark Strand

quote: Love is what makes the world turn around, the night turn into day, and dreams turn into reality.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: Those who have chosen to pass the night
author: Mark Strand

quote: Having come from the light and from the gods, here I am in exile, separated from them.
author: Umberto Eco

quote: Let night come; it's time to dream.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: The dark night has passed, and day has come again. But the day has brought strange tidings.
author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quote: Night is just a fusion of dreams.
author: Mirela Stancu

quote: i want her to know that
author: Avijeet Das

quote: What darkness swirls inside your head? You are the Pinot Noir beside my bed.
author: Silvia Ardor

quote: Abortive time: unwilling to tarry
author: Munia Khan

quote: But neither of us closed our eyes against the immeasurable dark of that silent night.
author: Tayari Jones

quote: Sunrise is the start of something beautiful: the day.
author: Juansen Dizon

quote: Night quilts the sky with stars sewn like the uneven stitching of my jacket.
author: Alexandra Christo

quote: It's the moon that moves me. The sunlight makes everything so obvious.
author: Bavo Dhooge

quote: I love the gap, that momentary gap where day and night are not defined.
author: debbie lynn - 360 degrees full circle

quote: All I'm saying," said Vince, "is we don't need to have ourselves all figured out in one night. You know?
author: Nilah Magruder

quote: Let love's eternal flame of hope hold back the shadows of the night.
author: Grace Willows

quote: The night felt very long, but it ended as all nights do.
author: Laini Taylor

quote: The sky was low at night, full of the presence of a strange and watchful God.
author: F.Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Night is the natural enemy of day.
author: Anthony T.Hincks

quote: Despite how dark it might be, what is tonight but the precursor to tomorrow?
author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quote: A masquerade will only last as long as the night is dark.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: Enjoy the wine, don’t spill the night…
author: Talismanist Giebra

quote: People drink democracy in a glass of tea
author: Sneha Subramanian Kanta

quote: People drink democracy in a glass of tea
author: Sneha Subramanian Kanta

quote: Enjoy the wine, don’t spill the night…
author: Talismanist Giebra

quote: There are exactly the same things in a room at night as there are in the daytime; it's just that you can't see them.
author: Arturo Pérez-Reverte

quote: He must have laughed at me
author: Natasha Jain

quote: The night, cold and silent,
author: Phen Weston

quote: As night falls, let the day's troubles slip away into
author: L.R. Knost

quote: Sleep is but a vessel in which our dreams traverse the heavens.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: Treat tonight like it’s the last night of your life. I hope it’s not, but hey, you never know.
author: Jason Medina

quote: We're all flames in the fire.
author: Kate McGahan

quote: Your skin is a thousand stars
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: ...to hold twilight or watch it darken, describes the pleasure we take in pausing to observe as day slips into night.
author: Louisa Thomsen Brits

quote: There will be stars over the place forever;
author: Sara Teasdale

quote: Light has to come at some point. Night can't stay here forever.
author: Rebekah Crane

quote: Sunday,February 4th 2018
author: Charmaine J Forde

quote: I want you to look at me the way I look at the ceiling in the night. The way three am knows my name.
author: Dominic Riccitello

quote: Oh how I enjoy the night
author: Evy Michaels

quote: Night time
author: Melody  Lee

quote: Reversing the sleep and wake cycles of the human through night shift work is known to cause extensive long term damage in humans.
author: Steven Magee

quote: I can be a hero and a villain all in one night.
author: Chelsea Sedoti

quote: I’d rather be the creep in the night and the fire that burns your eyes than the way you use and define life.
author: Dominic Riccitello

quote: It's the chill of a beautiful sunset that promises a lovely night ahead.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: Anyone who has experienced a debilitating sleep disorder knows what it is like to be the walking dead.
author: Steven Magee

quote: Sometimes the night can be your best therapist. For the moon is free, and always there to listen.
author: A.Y. Greyson

quote: It was dark, now, the gossamer moon hanging among diamond stars in the soft black of the night.
author: Amber Newberry

quote: I wonder if Linda would still come see me if she wasn't called sister. I wonder if light would still fade if weren't a word night.
author: Kendra Fortmeyer

quote: The quest is ongoing
author: Laurence Overmire

quote: Each day is born with a sunrise
author: Suzy Kassem

quote: You speak in night, not because it’s night, but because it’s dark enough in theory that no one will see you.
author: Dominic Riccitello

quote: The night kisses the fading day whispering to his ear, “I am death, your mother. I am to give you fresh birth.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Night has more words to say to you than the day can tell you!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: the train plunges on through the pitch-black night
author: Nazim Hikmet

quote: Dear soul,
author: Etel Adnan

quote: i am in need of a sudden Shift,
author: Syed Murtaza Haroon

quote: Under a night’s sky
author: Justin Wetch

quote: Dark nights are unpleasant,"
author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: The night. The stars. The river.
author: Edward Abbey

quote: It's when the sky slowly changes from day to night that you see God turn on his outside lights to illuminate the heavens for those below.
author: Anthony T.Hincks

quote: When night falls, does it make a sound?
author: Marty Rubin

quote: Silver constellations sparkled across the velvet sky, revealing the mythical creatures that lingered in the valley of stars.
author: Erin Forbes

quote: At the nights our real self - the most true and deepest emotions wake up.
author: Jeren N. Turoonju

quote: I have rather watch the beauty of night than the clamor of day.
author: Irfa Rahat

quote: The night was over, for he did not dare to play forbidden games with a woman who had proven too many times that she knew the dark side of the moon.
author: Gabriel García Márquez

quote: The night hides a world, but reveals a universe.
author: Terry Gotham

quote: Live at night, dream during the day. Oh life, why does it have to be this way?
author: Nico J. Genes

quote: The light overcome the darkness.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Colour my world with sunset peach and betwixt the dying day and blooming night, we shall dance across the impatient stars of twilight...
author: Virginia Alison

quote: It is at night that we talk , for that is the only time when people belong to themselves. The outer sun goes out and lets us look at the inner sun
author: Amruta Patil

quote: Sleep disorders are commonly misdiagnosed as mental health disorders.
author: Steven Magee

quote: Darkness fell, gathering sin.
author: Aaron Dries

quote: I look up upon a sparsely starred abyss
author: Justin Wetch

quote: Dreaming By Day, Wishing On Stars At Night...
author: Nyki Mack

quote: I have drunk the night
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: . . . a wind howling began, which seemed to form all over the country, as far as the imagination could grasp it through the gloom of the night.
author: Bram Stoker

quote: Your smile is what gets me through the day and my dreams of you are what gets me through the night.
author: Anthony T.Hincks

quote: Dad!" Jesus yelled.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: Through the dark night chasing the morning light
author: Richard L.  Ratliff

quote: The hush of the night sky is the silence of a graveyard.
author: Ted Chiang

quote: Relationship for someone it's like to life, as life happens once its happens once.
author: Mohammed Zaki Ansari

quote: Night, I have discovered, has a faintly bitter taste, caused by its large ingredient of Un-attained Possibility.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: May your lamp forever burn at night.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Man thalabal ‘ula sahiral layali.” He who wants glory will work late into the night. -184
author: Ahmad Fuadi

quote: Night gets its own way in the end. The torches go out,
author: Matthew Francis

quote: If you walk in the light, all the darkness around you shall disappear.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: When the rain finally abates, I decide to wait out the night instead of trying to climb in the dark.
author: Rae Carson

quote: The Moon is the light of the night.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The sun loves the moon so much that he dies every night to let her breathe, and in return, she reflects his love.
author: Jeffrey Fry

quote: Night heralded sleep and shadows, demons and dreams. But I heralded the night.
author: Roshani Chokshi

quote: I cast my eyes out to the sea
author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quote: you clutter my mind
author: Madisen Kuhn

quote: At a night like this,
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: When your dreams are clearer and stronger than your sleep, night becomes a mere extension of day
author: Anoop Raghav

quote: There are some places you can't visit anymore,
author: Vaishal sheth

quote: Tonight is the night of telling our stories. You tell three and I four.
author: Avijeet Das

quote: There are some days we can claim and there are other days that claim us.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: The night is the balm for the wounded souls of the world.
author: Avijeet Das

quote: The bird of hope sings
author: Neelam Saxena Chandra

quote: In day-time we investigate, but at night believe.
author: James Slack

quote: This is it. This is how I always saw heaven, always by the sea, always by night, always in the dark.
author: Hannah Lillith Assadi

quote: Now there were stars overhead, hanging like frozen spears of light, stabbing the night sky.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: My favorite symphony is the silent song of the night!
author: Avijeet Das

quote: The dawn is your enemy.
author: adult swim

quote: Last night, I was a mad man searching for a whiff of your fragrance. The stars and the moon even laughed at me.
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Last night I weaved dreams from the cobwebs of time!
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Starlight is best felt at noon...
author: Will Advise

quote: We take a last look out of the window at the night, and I send a silent wish to everyone out there for this kind of warmth.
author: Nina LaCour

quote: Don’t wait up for me tonight, for the night will be black and white.
author: Gérard de Nerval

quote: The night is the balm for the wounded soul!
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Yellow is the colour of the sun.
author: Anthony T. Hincks

quote: It was raining that night, when we kissed for the first time.
author: Avijeet Das

quote: Give me one more night to taste the dark
author: Munia Khan

quote: Persons in whom a crisis takes place pass the night preceding the paroxysm uncomfortably, but the succeeding night generally more comfortably.
author: Hippocrates

quote: Night never needs a shade
author: Munia Khan

quote: Life is the night sky
author: Richard L.  Ratliff

quote: Because I am, just as you are you. We don’t always get to pick who we are, Shelly Wynn, but we can choose to celebrate it.
author: Nathan Reese Maher

quote: Night is the time to dream and morning is the time to actualize them!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: When twilight sleeps holding the night
author: Munia Khan

quote: Night simply drapes itself over the day
author: Margarita Engle

quote: Build my night with your cheeks.
author: Malak El Halabi

quote: Why didn't anyone question "It's been a hard days night" Who talks like that anyway?
author: Chuck Bridges

quote: Somehow her hula hoop had cut into the driver’s side door like the vehicle was made of cheese.
author: Nathan Reese Maher

quote: Soon, all the children were chanting it. “No school! No school!
author: Nathan Reese Maher

quote: Aloha Oukou. It looked like your soul was escaping so I put you in a tree.
author: Nathan Reese Maher

quote: It is inevitable that there will come a time when mankind will go out more at night and stay indoors during the day to avoid harmful solar rays.
author: Nabil N. Jamal

quote: Lydia displays her right hand and instantly bathed the room with a blinding light. It lasted only a moment before it drew back into her palm.
author: Nathan Reese Maher

quote: Usually, when I dream of flying
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Die every night so in the morning you are reborn.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: I’m here for you. Always. Do you feel me?Hear me? I talk to you every night, does it reach you?
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: Hope is a helium balloon. It is a wish lantern set out into the dark sky of night.
author: Sharon Weil

quote: It is wonderful,
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: I left smiles on your wordless lips
author: Munia Khan

quote: Every day I thank God for giving me a little kind heart which bears this life
author: Ahlam Salhab

quote: We need to know that a dark night is always followed by a nice morning
author: Sunday Adelaja

quote: The night it falls
author: Virginia Alison

quote: And sometimes when I tilt my head,
author: Jasleen Kaur Gumber

quote: She wanted to reach up to the night and dig her fingers into it, beg it to stay just a little bit longer.
author: Adi Alsaid

quote: They say Night is all black in the face
author: Ankaj

quote: I slept under the moonlight and set my soul free, caged within jars like fireflies".
author: Prajakta Mhadnak

quote: The stars were better company anyway. They were very beautiful, and they almost never snored.
author: David Eddings

quote: Dark night knows what full moon requires
author: Munia Khan

quote: The Sun can rise anytime in your dreams. And there night may fall anytime as well.
author: Munia Khan

quote: A snake was never called by its name at night, because it would hear. It was called a string.
author: Chinua Achebe

quote: Starlight beats when heart twinkles
author: Munia Khan

quote: What your mind sees when you close your eyes marks the entrance to an endless universe: your imagination.
author: Stephen Helmes

quote: It was easy to conclude: The night was young and alive, in its ever so subtle way.
author: Lauren Lola

quote: Why are we sneaking out in the night?” Jack repeated.
author: Michael  Grant

quote: I still think about you at night
author: C.J. Carlyon

quote: The world has been blind in the presence of artificial lights.They blame about the darkness in broad daylight.
author: Bikash Chaurasiya

quote: Rape, cockroaches... are still a real nightmare.
author: Deyth Banger

quote: Woodget glanced into the dim shadows behind the trees. "What you be hiding fer?" he called.
author: Robin Jarvis

quote: The night had a nearly liquid quality, was like sliding into a warm swimming pool, a pool filled with buoyant darkenss instead of water.
author: Joe Hill

quote: I gave them everything I had, and I guess it feels
author: Kris Kidd

quote: And he will never know what it is to look up at the night sky and wish.
author: Sarah J. Maas

quote: A library at night is full of sounds: the unread books can't stand it any longer and announce their contents, some boasting, some shy, some devious.
author: Helen Oyeyemi

quote: I know that some night
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: When it happens and it hits hard, we decide certain things, and realize there's truth in all those dark, lonely days"
author: Dave Matthes

quote: In between waking up from bed in the morning and going back in the evening, let something happen. God will bless that “something” for you.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: Because at night
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: Night after night on starry wings
author: Munia Khan

quote: Whatever you value, it becomes your sun! If you value a calm night, your own sun will rise with the sunset on the horizon!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: You found me under the thousand stars, shining above us at the night. You found me and you wanted me to shine for you.
author: Tamara Stamenkovic

quote: Last night was dark and full of terror and while we slept, the angels kept their watch of wondering love.
author: OMOSOHWOFA CASEY

quote: Twilight ...
author: Neena Verma

quote: When something hurts them, they weep.
author: Christina Engela

quote: Nature is the guardian of Africa. While the sun lights the African sky in day time, the moon begs the world to help her lighting Africa in the night
author: Munia Khan

quote: Tread not into the fearsome night
author: Robin Jarvis

quote: Like the moon shining bright
author: Ana Claudia Antunes

quote: I think I can hear the unseen moon
author: Alexandra Oliva

quote: May the nights always be aglow
author: Sanober  Khan

quote: Not for everyone a darkest night is bid farewell by a bright sunrise.
author: Saud khan

quote: I love you to the moon and bed.
author: C.J. Carlyon

quote: The garden is a miraculous place, and anything can happen on a beautiful moonlit night.
author: William Joyce

quote: Stare up at the stars,
author: Kyra Jackson

quote: Day and night. Give and take. But never to die. Each have their time.
author: Zechariah Barrett

quote: Memories are fragile; they can be broken and forgotten or preserved like a tomb.
author: Tony Conte

quote: Battles waged in daylight are fought by soldiers. Battles waged at night are fought by savages.
author: Lance Conrad

quote: When the silence of the night becomes the chanting of poetry, the departure of con-cavity
author: Goitsemang Mvula

quote: You have to choose whether to go to a restless sleep or to stay awake and fight for a blissful night rest.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: The trees were set close and from the perimeter of that parcel of land I could not see the school hidden within them.
author: Thomas Ligotti

quote: The rangers of the night stay strangers in the eye of time.
author: Adhish Mazumder

quote: All vampires are brothers in the brotherhood of night!
author: Stewart Stafford

quote: As sonner began as sooner finished... the guilt is after you. I feel it, I see it and I smell you have done something..., didn't you??
author: Deyth Banger

quote: Stealthily the stars slid forward into nothingness.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: I couldn't sleep 5/23/2016 and 5/24/2016 the time between them the night which puts differences between the day and split them.
author: Deyth Banger

quote: I suppose even monsters can be afraid of the dark.
author: Leslye Walton

quote: The moon seems unaware
author: Munia Khan

quote: Last night, I spoke to God.
author: Kamand Kojouri

quote: There’s an infant part in our souls which longs for the lullaby truths of life every night for a tranquil slumber.
author: Munia Khan

quote: Out here,
author: A.P. Sweet

quote: Midnight! the outpost of advancing day!
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Nights; are belong to the universe that speaks about an unspoken feelings into a poetry.
author: Dina Zettira Putri

quote: Then she called Gansey.
author: Maggie Stiefvater

quote: ...a redoubtable alchemy was at work behind impenetrable veils as the forest prepared its nocturnal mysteries.
author: Julien Gracq

quote: My last thought before falling asleep last night was a realisation that I was falling in love with Andrew.
author: N.R. Walker

quote: Sometimes at night
author: A.P. Sweet

quote: at night i loved her
author: A.P. Sweet

quote: The starry night sky echoed across my thoughts, the expanse of my own void filtered in its quiet solitude.
author: Gina Marinello-Sweeney

quote: Bored with the upsetting realities of the day? Then leave yourself to the calming mysteries of the night!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: Listen to the sunset...see its pretty hue... When you see it, think of me...and I'll think of you...
author: Oksana Rus

quote: From this day forward, you will be my sun at dawn and my stars at night, and I vow to love and cherish you for all our days.
author: Marissa Meyer

quote: I have woken up…quite sloshed
author: Sanober Khan

quote: Rejoice with glitters of ashes tonight
author: Munia Khan

quote: Let the night take you. Let the stars evaporate into your dreams. Let sleep be the only comfort for you to believe.
author: Anthony Liccione

quote: Rubbing noses with me, she laughed, and I swear the Elysian night sang with the sound of it.
author: Jovee Winters

quote: By night, beloved, tie your heart to mine
author: Pablo Neruda

quote: It's late at night when the memory comes for me, like it always seems to when the relief of sleep seems ready to draw me under.
author: Joaquin Lowe

quote: They sat on the boarding house porch and saw the sun plunge into the same crack in the earth from which the night emerged.
author: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: She didn't fear the night, though she found little comfort in its dark hours.
author: Sarah J. Maas

quote: Drink in the moon as though you might die of thirst.
author: Sanober Khan

quote: I believe the night I’ve never met
author: Munia Khan

quote: Lords of spirit, Lords of breath,
author: Madeleine L'Engle

quote: It takes grace to stop working and go to bed. When in bed, more grace is needed to rise up and begin work again.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: A radiant full moon of silver hangs in the black sky, between the veils of misty clouds.
author: Moonshine Noire

quote: When life gets dark, that's when stars appear among us. Shine bright, beautiful ones. Throw light from your burning hearts.
author: John Mark Green

quote: When I finally lie down, I find sleep elusive. The same thoughts that trouble me during the day are only compounded by the stillness of night.
author: Brandon Sanderson

quote: With night's
author: Adelaide Crapsey

quote: Hurry up, before there's no more night left.
author: Maggie Stiefvater

quote: No matter how dark your night, my friend, may you always find enough light to take the next step.
author: John Mark Green

quote: All the best secrets are told at night.
author: Mark  Lawrence

quote: You have not lived until you have fled a city in a country where you do not speak the language in the middle of the night.
author: Ken Poirot

quote: The lamp hummed:
author: T.S. Eliot

quote: the best ideas flow at night
author: Jaime Tenorio Valenzuela

quote: The night is the blink of a day
author: Jaime Tenorio Valenzuela

quote: -a superb moon, round as a pumpkin and golden as honey, filling the rooftop world with light, and deep, mysterious shadow.
author: Barbara Sleigh

quote: I studied a crescent moon hung crooked in a plum purple sky and thought about what it would be like to truly be seen.
author: Laura Whitcomb

quote: Everything that is good in the day is even better in the night.
author: Joe Hill

quote: The inclusion of dreams is the only viable supplement to the absence of more favourable outcomes.
author: Benjamin Meadows

quote: With dark raven paper and twinkling white ink, I wrote my heart in the night’s sky.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: I can’t sleep alone anymore
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: In the darkness and the snow, the street is empty
author: Miriam Joy

quote: The silence of the night awakens my soul
author: Dorinda Duclos

quote: The night sky stretched on forever above me, the stars flung like glass beads and pearls on a black velvet cloak.
author: Laurie Halse Anderson

quote: I do this so you cannot help but hear. a wise man views a moonless night with fear.
author: Patrick Rothfuss

quote: we have forgotten what night tastes like,
author: Beth Morey

quote: The things that happen in the night are hidden even from the night.
author: Marty Rubin

quote: I'll never get over the fact
author: Alex Dimitrov

quote: Come let us haste, the stars grow high,
author: John Milton

quote: Cemeteries can be creepy, creepy, ‘specially at night.
author: Jason Medina

quote: The sun shall lead you in the day.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: You never get tired of looking at the stars
author: Warren Ellis

quote: At night I dream of things I scoff at by day.
author: Jaclyn Dolamore

quote: No matter how dark the night may get, your light will never burn out.
author: Jeanette LeBlanc

quote: ...yes, in the obscured sky a moon does float, newly, a wishing moon, a sliver of ancient rock, a goddess, a wink.
author: Margaret Atwood The Handmaid's Tale

quote: The day here is a something without value, a mere torment suffered by living creatures as they await the night. Night is deliverance.
author: Tayeb Salih

quote: To speak your Heart out
author: Dinakar Phillip

quote: Jeeter?" Grace whispered into her walkie-talkie. "Are you awake?" She waited.
author: Jo Ann Yhard

quote: Light
author: Suman Pokhrel

quote: Ignore the reek of feces in the air, the bloodstains on the ground, and you have yourself a glorious night.
author: Katherine McIntyre

quote: Overhead the sliver of a moon barely illuminated anything and shadows slunk on every corner.
author: Katherine McIntyre

quote: I've often been sorry to see a night end, even while I have loved seeing the dawn come.
author: Marilynne Robinson

quote: The sea loved the moon
author: Saiber

quote: Somewhere in the night a
author: Marina Tsvetaeva

quote: when I finally begin to drift
author: Sanober Khan

quote: As the sky prepares to settle its tired, aching feet
author: Sanober Khan

quote: the sapphire depth
author: Sanober Khan

quote: You don’t need a sad soul
author: Munia Khan

quote: The moon is my mother. She is not sweet like Mary.
author: Sylvia Plath

quote: I wonder at the starry pattern in the sky
author: Munia Khan

quote: There is a romance about all those who are abroad in the black hours.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: It's true. I've seen it when the crescent moon shone bright on a cold, dark night. The darker the night, the brighter God's smile.
author: Anusha Atukorala

quote: They don’t know I only speak in runaway train stations
author: Katelin Wagner

quote: Nocturnal with a love for night, I'd stay up to see sunlight...
author: Donna Lynn Hope

quote: Birth our night into day
author: Scott Hastie

quote: Fear gripped her like hands around the neck, the way it could only happen in an unfamiliar room in the pitch black of night.
author: Elin Hilderbrand

quote: Love in a night shall live and die,
author: Aleister Crowley

quote: The Cottage Diner’s homey lights glowed onto black asphalt which just sucked up the beams to spit out more shadows.
author: Katherine McIntyre

quote: I looked like someone who'd had a night, and had a story to tell about it.
author: Morgan Matson

quote: The nights did not come gently but seemed to slam down angrily upon the Earth.
author: Rick Yancey

quote: Bedtime is daytime,
author: Lenore Kandel

quote: The twilight seems invidious.It simply can’t let the sun hide away when darkness is just another name for night..
author: Munia Khan

quote: Nights are rebellious, they only demand the truth
author: Mehek Bassi

quote: But sometimes, when she'd be all by herself, walking home late in the evening on a crowded street she'd be afraid of her own shadow following her...
author: Sanhita Baruah

quote: Do not trap yourself into an owl's hooting sound
author: Munia Khan

quote: It's an easy guess, why some get famous over night and not during the day.
author: Aleksandra Ninkovic

quote: The mirror's light sparks in the eyes,
author: Alexander Blok

quote: And I played music through the night, alone, echoing through the halls. My life, alive through note.
author: Jonathan Lamas

quote: It is the hour of departure, the hard cold hour which the night fastens to all timetables.
author: Pablo Neruda

quote: What a fucking gorgeous night!
author: Kirsten Hubbard

quote: Some nights are just too long when you don't know what keeps you awake...
author: Amit Aarav

quote: Seeing that I would never manage to fall asleep, I arose, lit a candle, and after dressing went outside.
author: Boris Sadovskoy

quote: In the silence of night, great minds either unite or die
author: Katja Michael

quote: As she’d walked along this street, a million stars stretched across an indigo canvas, holding all the freedom she’d yearned for every night.
author: Katherine McIntyre

quote: At night is when my mind comes alive.
author: Poem Porns

quote: It is unnecessary to heighten the glory of day by comparing it with the preceding twilight.
author: Catharine Maria Sedgwick

quote: The long night begins.
author: Mark Simo

quote: A perfect night... a perfect forever
author: Mary E. Pearson

quote: In the morning, celebrate the beauty and warmth of sun light,
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When the owl sings, the night is silent. (Quand le hibou chante, La nuit est silence)
author: Charles de Leusse

quote: Lightning hides the colour of night
author: Munia Khan

quote: What's done at night belongs to the night. In the daytime you don't talk about it.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Night was fading over the fields as if the rain had washed the darkness out of the hem of its garment.
author: Cornelia Funke

quote: The stars will live for me, if not anything else
author: Munia Khan

quote: This tune goes manly.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Our first act as free men was to throw ourselves onto the provisions. thats all we thought about. No thought of revenge, or of parents. Only of bread.
author: Elie Wiesel Night

quote: I love the night! It's not uncommon for me to see the light of a new day before closing my eyes on the old one.
author: Peggy Toney Horton

quote: 40Wednesday has been canceled due to a scheduling error.
author: Ceciil Baldwin

quote: Don’t let your dreams be forsaken by the starry nights
author: Munia Khan

quote: Soon would come the night in which there was no more work – not the work of the hands, nor the work of the mind, nor the work of the heart.
author: Paul Russell

quote: I don’t like coming over here at night, the girl said. The bayou is scary in the dark, all manner of things running wild out there.
author: Samuel Snoek-Brown

quote: The reason I sketch your pic at times because in your smile I see something more beautiful than the stars.
author: Abhishek Kumar Singh

quote: I tagged your ass the other night," I said, "while you were sleeping- and you liked it."
author: Giorge Leedy

quote: When darkness falls, beauty is lit from within.
author: Johnathan Jena

quote: I made a wish on a sliver of moonlight
author: Tom Waits

quote: For there was nothing in his eyes but the black night and the cold stars.
author: Susanna Clarke

quote: she has craters
author: Lokesh Fouzdar

quote: Above us, the constellations spun and the moon paced her weary course. We lay stricken and sleepless as the hours passed.
author: Madeline Miller

quote: The Jewish day begins in the calm of evening, when it won't shock the system with its arrival.
author: Nathan Englander

quote: Day must be an exciting friend, but night is a truthful one.
author: Himanshu Chhabra

quote: But here there is no light,
author: John Keats

quote: When night comes on in a room lit by kerosene, any flicker of the flame can give the sense that darkness is about to triumph.
author: Larry Watson

quote: Even those afraid of the dark must live through half of each day as night, to come to see the beauty in each.
author: Johnathan Jena

quote: And it was dark
author: Billy Joel

quote: The night sky made her feel infinite before she knew the word.
author: Thomm Quackenbush

quote: Night is irregular. What is not done in the daytime becomes possible at night: murder and sex and thought.
author: Alexei Panshin

quote: The phone rang. Softly, in actuality, yet it seemed loud and ominous, as phones do at night in dark hotel rooms.
author: Jim Thompson

quote: I always welcomed the comforting cloak of night except for the times when I lost something in it.
author: Donna Lynn Hope

quote: I love it when there’s nothing
author: Anna Jae

quote: come, ancient and unchanging night
author: Pierre Péju

quote: Beware the knowledge thou seek, for knowledge though oft light, can sow the seeds of night and reap from the darkness that ensues"
author: Esmerelda Jane Forstine

quote: A man, who needs you, will not come to visit you in the middle of the night. If he is there, definitely wants to stop you from being helpful.
author: M.F. Moonzajer

quote: I desired always to stretch the night and fill it fuller and fuller with dreams.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: When you're lying in bed at night and regrets from the day come to steal your sleep...
author: L.R. Knost

quote: The moon was reigning over their world, glowing its full splendor to all those willing to look up.
author: Irina Serban

quote: He stood between death and life as between night and morning, and thought with a soaring rapture, 'I am not afraid.
author: Mary Renault

quote: As the saturating colors of sun-life fade from sight, the ominous moon reaches out its long arm and applies the dark dyes of night.
author: Daniel J. Rice

quote: ...before the dawn I leave the night behind me
author: Munia Khan

quote: You'll become that devil overnight, if you want to become that celebrity overnight.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quote: Such a night cannot be shaken from a woman’s memory. Such a night changes your life forever.
author: Sara Sheridan

quote: The summer night was settling upon the neighborhood like a dark lace veil, casting dappled shadows on the roofs and sidewalks and lawns.
author: Victoria Kahler

quote: What did I fear, and why? — I, to whom the night had been
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Don't accommodate complains in your chamber, else you have a sleepless and restless night. Keep them away and fall in love with actions for solution!
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: I went to the little window and inhaled the country air. One could hear the breathing of the night, feminine, enormous.
author: Octavio Paz

quote: The night! When the outside world is hiding in darkness, you have to turn on the light within in order to see where you put your steps.
author: Irina Serban

quote: The world has two faces :
author: Rohan Nath

quote: Walk with me now into this very bright night, and revere with me in silence what must be God-given and what is surely God-taken.
author: Carew Papritz

quote: Work hard in the day; as hard as you can even if no one is watching you! Work harder in the night; as harder as if everyone's eyes are on you.
author: Israelmore Ayivor

quote: all hopes there, so close to each other,
author: Munia Khan

quote: Night air has the strangest flavour
author: Jamie Woon

quote: I just wish you could see my demons for what they are, and lay here beside me on the floor. No words. Just your presence.
author: Charlotte Eriksson

quote: Although I love elegant parties, dancing and dining and spending the night with a sweet woman in my arms, my life belongs to literature.
author: Roman Payne

quote: We look up to see if it is day or night.
author: Roman Payne

quote: Some nights, we were a city of two.
author: Jerry Spinelli

quote: I went to the little window and inhaled the country air. One could hear the breathing of the night, feminine, enormous.
author: Octavio Paz

quote: I see you from afar—fragile and shy as a star gleaming through a cloudy rift
author: john j geddes

quote: Trees don't sneak on you."
author: Erin Hunter

quote: A single night is stuffed with minutes, but they leak out, one by one.
author: David Mitchell

quote: So they went running together, silent, toward the vast wastes of snow where no living thing but they two moved under the stars of night.
author: Clemence Housman

quote: I roused myself from the book which I was dreaming over rather than reading, and left my chambers to meet the cool night air in the suburbs.
author: Wilkie Collins

quote: Night had come and eaten everything.
author: Rebecca Ethington

quote: Just as stars shine brightest in the darkest night, your joy blazes brilliantly through life’s problems when you count them as joy.
author: Elizabeth George

quote: Night is when the whispers of the past become the echoes of the present.
author: Faraaz Kazi

quote: He's looking into the night, in case a shadow comes to listen and look.
author: Herta Müller

quote: There dwells a life in every star;
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Tick Tock, The sun fell down; Ding Dong the moon took a peek, Ring Ding, It's Harmonizing my Insanity
author: Whitney Smith

quote: Most love stories are nocturnal. That's what makes them so fascinating.
author: Raymond Federman

quote: since some people had told me that I was ugly, I always preferred shade to the sun, darkness to light
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: The sea is calm tonight.
author: Matthew Arnold

quote: Art thou like me, child of my darkest heart? And dost thou think my untamed thoughts and speak my vast language?
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: Try to be a whole person. Not just a night person, or a day person. Be the kind of person who can live in both.
author: Regina Doman

quote: I was downstairs, reading."
author: Elizabeth Berg

quote: the oncoming night was filled with the mystery of unknown places and of distance, of things that happened long ago and happenings yet to com
author: Elyne Mitchell

quote: In a beautiful night, under the stars, man always feels himself above the sky, beside the God!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: I think so much
author: jyoti mishra

quote: from the prose poem "The Universe Thrums on regardless" in my book SPAN.
author: Jay Woodman

quote: I was a creature of the night, I wasn't supposed to be afraid of the dark. Not that it was the dark I was afraid of--it was the
author: Carrie Vaughn

quote: As if the night has been created for the writers and as if the silence of it is the very inspiration itself!
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: You are very much lovable, that even dreaming you every night is not repeated.
author: M.F. Moonzajer

quote: I do dream every night but in the morning I regret.
author: M.F. Moonzajer

quote: To be inspired is great, but to inspire is an honor.
author: Stacey T. Hunt

quote: If you don't believe in yourself, who will?' ~Maybeck
author: Ridley Pearson

quote: Don't let a three-o'clock-at-night feeling fog your soul.
author: L.M. Montgomery

quote: However impatient she might be in the day, however filled with little sudden angers, at night she was all tenderness.
author: Pearl S. Buck

quote: We love against the night, burning like stars against the darkness of bread and circuses.
author: David Paul Kirkpatrick

quote: Others, I am not the first,
author: A.E. Housman

quote: The amount of perfume she had on was like a human sacrifice on Incense Night.
author: Stephen Moles

quote: We must take sides. Neutrality helps the oppressor, never the victim. Silent encourages the tormentor, never the tormented.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: Odd, the words: ‘while away the time’.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: Oh, I don't wonder babies always cry when they wake up in the night. So often I want to do it too.
author: L.M. Montgomery

quote: Man asks and God replies but we don't understand his replies because they dwell in the depths of our souls and remain there until we die.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: Either conquer the night, or become one of its conquests.
author: Abigail Biddinger

quote: I won't let that night ruin you forever." But it did, it broke me into a million pieces and blew them away in the wind, like crumbled leaves.
author: Jessica Sorensen

quote: Women can go mad with insomnia.
author: Cathy Ostlere

quote: This day I ceased to plead. I was no longer capable of lamentation. On the contrary, I felt very strong. I was the accuser, God the accused.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: Rather nice night, after all. Stars are out and everything. Exceptionally tasty assortment of them.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: We should live, my Lesbia, and love
author: Catullus

quote: ...And we left the light
author: Pierre Albert-Birot

quote: It's six o'clock; my drink is at the three-quarter mark - three-quarters down not three-quarters up - and the night begins.
author: Cornell Woolrich

quote: You know what the best part of the stars is?"
author: Megan Hart

quote: He was in a fairy kingdom where everything was possible.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Night falls fast. Today is in the past.
author: John Green

quote: There was nothing the matter out there. It was in here, with me.
author: Cornell Woolrich

quote: A calm night is open to all the truths.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: When daylight is here i dream of the night,
author: J.M. Pierce

quote: A night without stars is a night wasted.
author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quote: ...my dreams are tangled in images of stars and clouds and firelight - we go camping at night - it's my lucid dream of being with you...
author: John Geddes

quote: Black as night and as beautiful as forever.
author: Stephen King

quote: Before the beginning of years
author: Algernon Charles Swinburne

quote: I can see lights in the distance trembling in the dark cloak of night
author: Loreena McKennitt

quote: They said a lot of things to each other that night, but nothing that involved words.
author: Michael Grant Fear

quote: ... paint in blue and black...sometimes gray - the colors of night - occasionally I surprise you with a mustard yellow, but then, I am a poet ...
author: John Geddes

quote: Night is a world lit by itself
author: Antonio Porchia

quote: You know you love him when you can't sleep at night and get up early to talk to him the next morning.
author: Kayla Carson

quote: ...skeins of mist like translucent silk, bending and unbending in the headlight tunnels...
author: John Geddes A Familiar Rain

quote: Television knows no night. It is perpetual day. TV embodies our fear of the dark, of night, of the other side of things.
author: Jean Baudrillard

quote: After that there was silence for a while, only the sound of the shovel biting into the earth and the hissing splatter of the loose dirt.
author: Cornell Woolrich

quote: A raging, glowering full moon had come up, was peering down over the side of the sky well above the patio.
author: Cornell Woolrich

quote: Night sometimes lends such tragic assistance to catastrophe.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: When you paint late at night, drinking beer or wine or both, you gotta be very careful to watch what you are doing...
author: Hiroko Sakai

quote: Stay home and the crooks win. They get the night, by default and concession, the night which should rightly belong to all of us.
author: Claire Cross

quote: Three o'clock in the morning.
author: Cornell Woolrich

quote: Then without any warning the car stopped. They were there.
author: Cornell Woolrich

quote: The worst things always happen at night, and oftener than one would think on stormy nights. ("The Compensation House")
author: Charles Collins

quote: We look up to see if it is day or night. If stars burn cool and moon does shine, we take to smoke divine and wine.
author: Roman Payne

quote: He rolled his eyes and took my hand. His hand was hard and calloused, tough with muscle and old scars.
author: James Patterson

quote: I am the eye that beholds... And I am the dreamer that paints the stars in the night sky... For I am the one they call artist, and you call Love.
author: Solange nicole

quote: War is like night, she said. It covers everything.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: Darling," he said distractedly,"about the moon..."
author: Julia Quinn

quote: Anyone and anything can survive the daylight. It's night that's the hardest to live.
author: Darnell Lamont Walker

quote: ... going out late at night and laying in the dewy field and reading a Kurt Vonnegut book by moonlight.
author: John Green

quote: It was a good apple too. A good apple, picked by a madman on a full moon night.
author: Steven Herrick

quote: Through the night we drove in a tangle of waking and sleeping, nightmares from hell and holy white dreams.
author: Glenda Millard

quote: Because when the night gets here, I’ll be the youngest I’ll ever be again, so I will laugh and celebrate relative youth.
author: Darnell Lamont Walker

quote: And I feel like a real Dad when I read to her at night. She won't sleep without one story, at least.
author: Steven Herrick
